Package io.j4c.microprofile.server.spi

Interface MpServiceContext


  • public interface MpServiceContext
    A context to allow a microprofile server extension to configure additional resources with Jersey, web server or use the CDI container (already booted).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      javax.enterprise.inject.se.SeContainer getCdiContainer​()
      The CDI container used by this server (Weld SE container).
      org.eclipse.microprofile.config.Config getConfig​()
      The Microprofile config instance used to configure this server.
      Config getJ4cConfig​()
      The J4C config instance used to configure this server (will have same properties as getConfig()).
      org.glassfish.jersey.server.ResourceConfig getResourceConfig​()
      The Jersey resource configuration that can be used to register additional features, resources etc.
      ServerConfiguration.Builder getServerConfigBuilder​()
      J4C webserver configuration builder that can be used to re-configure the server.
      Routing.Builder getServerRoutingBuilder​()
      J4C webserver routing builder that can be used to add routes to the webserver.

      Register an instance of a class for later use (e.g.

        Returns:
        J4C config instance

        org.glassfish.jersey.server.ResourceConfig getResourceConfig​()
        The Jersey resource configuration that can be used to register additional features, resources etc.

      • getCdiContainer

        javax.enterprise.inject.se.SeContainer getCdiContainer​()

      • getServerConfigBuilder

        ServerConfiguration.Builder getServerConfigBuilder​()
        J4C webserver configuration builder that can be used to re-configure the server.
        Returns:
        server configuration builder

      • getServerRoutingBuilder

        Routing.Builder getServerRoutingBuilder​()
        J4C webserver routing builder that can be used to add routes to the webserver.
        Returns:
        server routing builder

      • register

        <U> void register​(Class<? extends U> key,
                  U instance)
        Register an instance of a class for later use (e.g. for outbound configuration). This will replace existing instance of the class if it is already configured.
        Type Parameters:
        U - type of the instance
        Parameters:
        key - class to register
        instance - instance of a class
